attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877215604. Balance of warranty
Full Service History
EX CMH SPECIAL DEMO
ONE OWNER AND WELL LOOKED AFTER
ONLY 68000KMS FOR A 2019 !!!
A LOW MILEAGE VEHICLE THAT'S ACCIDENT FREE
THESE VEHICLES ARE CURRENTLY IN HUGE DEMAND AND LIMITED STOCK .
The WOW feature of the vehicle is because The Nissan NP300 Hardbody's diesel engines are the result of a 50-year heritage of engineering expertise. So when it comes to reliability, power and performance, the second generation 2.5-litre common-rail turbo diesel engine is as dependable and responsive as you can get.
Although the choice of the right NP300 for you is going to be based on your personal needs, we can highly recommend the Diesel Driven 2.5 HI-RIDER. This bakkie is the perfect blend of workhorse and family vehicle and also has a very capable off road offering to boot! It is packed full of safety features and even has a very high comfort level, which when added to the impressive Max towing capacity (with a trailer that comes with an overrun brake) of 1410Kg’s, ensures that the NP300 is at the top of the list when outdoors orientated families are looking for a great all-rounder pickup.
